alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 2:33AM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 10 inches. * WHERE...Southern Somerset and Central Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The potential exists for snowbands that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall, which will lead to rapid snow accumulations and extremely dangerous travel conditions. Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of between 1-2" per hour are possible late this afternoon through early this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
